hero.title: Input a URL, Create Your Website Design Blueprint
hero.subtitle: IdeaVisor helps entrepreneurs quickly capture design inspiration. Just provide a reference website and instantly get a customizable website framework and visual style.

features.title: How VisionFlow Enhances Your Design Process
features.subtitle: Transform vague ideas into clear design blueprints, saving valuable time and resources
features.feature1_desc: Automatically analyze and extract color schemes, typography rules, layout structures, and UI component styles from target websites.
features.feature2_desc: Get complete HTML, CSS, and JavaScript file packages, including responsive page templates and components, ready for your project development.
features.feature3_desc: Use our visual editing environment to directly modify text, replace images, and adjust colors without coding knowledge.
features.feature4_desc: Access UI elements and content modules inspired by target websites. Build custom pages with drag-and-drop while maintaining visual consistency.
features.feature5_desc: Instantly view your design changes and generate shareable links for collaboration with team members or clients.
features.feature6_desc: Try core features without registration, quickly experience VisionFlow's capabilities, and create an account later for more privileges.

workflow.title: From Concept to Blueprint in Three Steps
workflow.subtitle: A simple, intuitive process that lets you focus on creativity rather than technical details
workflow.step1_desc: Provide a link to a website you like, and VisionFlow will begin analyzing its visual style and structural characteristics.
workflow.step2_desc: Our system quickly extracts color schemes, font styles, page structures, and component designs, usually in just seconds.
workflow.step3_desc: Adjust the generated design blueprint to suit your needs, add your content, and download the complete website file package.

playground.title: Experience VisionFlow Now
playground.subtitle: No registration needed - input a URL and instantly feel the design

comparison.title: IdeaVisor vs. Other Design Tools
comparison.subtitle: Learn how IdeaVisor brings more value to your design process

pain_points.title: Solving Common Design Process Pain Points
pain_points.subtitle: We understand the challenges entrepreneurs face in the website design process, and IdeaVisor provides effective solutions
pain_points.pain1_desc: Most entrepreneurs lack professional design skills and cannot effectively communicate their website vision, making design communication difficult.
pain_points.pain2_desc: In the early stages of a startup, time and money are tight, making it impossible to afford expensive design services or invest a lot of time in learning design skills.
pain_points.pain3_desc: Entrepreneurs struggle to accurately convey their design expectations to designers or development teams, leading to frequent revisions and increased communication costs.
pain_points.pain4_desc: In the early stages of a project, entrepreneurs often find it difficult to determine the ideal design direction and lack effective sources of inspiration and reference standards.
pain_points.solution1: By extracting design styles from existing websites, non-designers can create professional-quality design prototypes without having to learn complex design tools.
pain_points.solution2: Generate website design prototypes in seconds, greatly shortening the design process and allowing you to invest your valuable time and resources in core business development.
pain_points.solution3: Provide visual design prototypes and sharing capabilities that allow you to clearly showcase design directions and facilitate team understanding and efficient communication.
pain_points.solution4: By analyzing and extracting design elements from existing websites and providing a rich case gallery, we help you discover and determine the most suitable design style.

hero.title: AI-Powered Design Inspiration
hero.subtitle: Generate unique visuals to inspire your website design using our advanced AI image generator. Describe your vision, and let IdeaVisor's AI bring it to life.

form.description_label: Enter a detailed description of the image you want to generate:
form.description_placeholder: E.g., A modern minimalist website homepage for a tech startup with blue and white color scheme, featuring abstract geometric shapes and clean typography.

result.title: Generated Result
result.empty_state: Your generated image will appear here

cta.title: Ready to Create Your Website Design?
cta.subtitle: Use these AI-generated design inspirations as a starting point for your next project with IdeaVisor

cta.note: No credit card required. Try before you pay.
